name: mongodb-seed-exercise
description: 1. Let's build a seed script - We need lots of data, we can use faker.js to create big amounts of fake data - Make yourself familiar with faker.js https://www.npmjs.com/package/faker - Use mongoose to connect to your database https://mongoosejs.com/The docs can be challenging, take your time! - Create a schema for users:   - First Name   - Last Name   - Email   - Age   - Username   - Short bio   - Address:     - Street     - Street number     - Zip     - City    - Country    - Phone number
